//文件用途: 这个文件用于存储游戏中的固定数据。访问方式例子:gameData.floor.one.enemy1.hp
//注: Josn文件不支持用纯数字做key

level1.eventCard: Drag the card sideways to continue.
level1.eventText1: Once upon a time, there is a land filled with magic and mysterious elements, and within it, there is a dungeon full of mystery.
level1.eventText2: A powerful dragon lives within the dungeon and would bring tragedy to the world once every few years.
level1.eventText3: However, as a prophecy tells, one day a brave man would come with the great sword full of unexplainable power, and they would use it to defeat the dragon.
level1.eventText4:
You are an adventurer.

Your hometown is destroyed by the dragon during the previous attack.
level1.eventText5: As you see the fire burn through your hometown, you are filled with sorrow and anger, and you swear to defeat the dragon with the great sword from the prophecy.
level1.eventText6: After great effort, you finally obtained the great sword
level1.eventText7: In front of you, a guardian appears with the sword.
level1.eventText8: Guardian: Congrats on completing the trial of the great sword.
level1.eventText9: Guardian: I will now let you handle the responsibility of obtaining it.
level1.eventText10: Guardian: Remember, the great sword comes with fascinating power, but it would only activate during times of danger.

level2.eventText:
You have arrived at the first floor of the dungeon.
Immediately, you are attacked by a monster.

level3.eventText1: The skeleton is moving towards you.
level3.eventText2:
You took 1 damage!

And you dealt 1 damage!

The skeleton is moving towards you.
level3.eventText3:
You dodged the attack!

The skeleton is moving towards you.
level3.eventText4:
You dealt 1 damage!

The skeleton is trying to attack you.
level3.eventText5:
Nothing happened.

The skeleton is trying to attack you.
level3.eventCard: Drag the card sideways to make a move.

level5.eventText: You do not face any obstacles. You continue forward.
level5.eventCard1: You fell into a trap. You are dead.
level5.eventCard2: you get camped by a group of monsters. You are dead.
level5.eventCard3: You accidentally activated a switch that fires an arrow behind you. You are shot. You are dead.

level1.eventText:
At the gate

A monster's roar came from behind the gate.

level2.right1: While he lures the giant away to the next level.
level2.eventText1: Coming to the second level, you see a Elf hunter being chased by a giant and you choose:
level2.eventText2: Congratulations! You have defeated the giant!
level2.battleText2:
The giant hit you for 2 points of damage.

You hit the giant for 1 point of damage

Giant ready to move.
level2.battleText3:
You dodged the giant's attack.

Giant ready to move.
level2.battleText4:
You hit the giant for 1 point of damage.

Giant ready to attack.
level2.battleText5:
The giant did not attack you.

Giant ready to attack.
level2.battleText6:
The giant hit you for 2 points of damage.

You hit the giant for 1 point of damage.

Giant are preparing for next action.
level2.battleText7:
You dodged the giant's attack.

Giant are preparing for next action
level2.battleText8:
You hit the giant for 1 point of damage.

Giant are preparing for next action.
level2.battleText9:
The giant did not attack you.

Giant are preparing for next action.
level2.battleText10:
You failed to defeat the giant.

You are dead.
level2.eventCard1: When some powerful enemies are continuously attacked will enter the rage state.
level2.eventCard2: You cannot judge the actions of enemies in a state of rage.
level2.eventCard3: The giant entered the rage state

level3.left2: Click the switch on the left
level3.right2: Click the switch on the right
level3.eventText1:
Elf: Thank you for saving my life.

To repay you for your help, let me tell you a secret.
level3.eventText2:
Elf: There is a mysterious treasure chest hidden here, and I happen to know its location.

This is the address of the treasure chest.
level3.eventText3:
Elf: Of course, you can also not believe me and go directly to the next level

You choose:
level3.eventText4: Elf: Okay, but I'll repay you in other ways for your help.
level3.eventText5:
You follow the hunter's guide and come to a treasure chest.

But the treasure chest has two locks on it, and each lock has two switches.
level3.eventText6: For the first lock, you choose to click:
level3.eventText7:
You clicked the right switch and the first lock opened.

For the second lock, you choose to click:
level3.eventText8:
As you click, the treasure chest suddenly explodes. 

You are dead.
level3.eventText9: You clicked the right switch and both locks are open.
level3.eventText10:
You have obtained a shield from a treasure chest that contains mysterious powers.

Now, it's time to head to the next level.

level1.eventText1: When you are standing in front of the door towards the next floor...
level1.eventText2: You feel a strong power behind the door.

level2.eventCard1: You arrive at the last floor of the dungeon...
level2.eventCard2: ...and see a dragon spiraling in the sky.
level2.eventCard3: Without a second thought, you head towards the dragon...
level2.eventCard4:
The dragon becomes furious. 
It is more likely to attack you now.
level2.eventCard5: The elf shot an arrow at the dragon and attracted dragon's attention.
level2.eventCard6: The dragon is going berserk, you cannot tell what it is doing
level2.eventText1: The dragon is trying to attack.
level2.eventText2: The dragon is trying to move toward you.
level2.eventText3: The dragon is trying to spit fire.
level2.eventText4: Elf: I cannot believe you are brave enough to challenge the dragon.
level2.eventText5: Elf: As you saved my life, I will come to help you now
level2.eventText6: The dragon attacks the elf. The elf faints.
level2.eventText7: The dragon spit fire at you at last action.
level2.eventText8: The dragon moved toward you at last action.
level2.eventText9: The dragon stares at you with anger in its eyes.

level3.eventText1: After a hard-fought battle, you defeat the dragon.
level3.eventText3: Its eyes are filled with unwillingness.
level3.eventText4:
Dragon: I will curse you, 
that you will be as chaotic, cruel, 
and merciless as me.
level3.eventText5:
Dragon: I will give you all my power, 
and make you become just like me.
level3.eventText6:
The dragon's curse heads toward you, 
and you choose to...
level3.eventText7: A faint light emanated from the sword...
level3.eventText8: A strong light emanated from the sword!

level4.eventText1: You try to block the curse with the power of the sword...
level4.eventText3: The power within the sword emptied.
level4.eventText4: The curse gets into your body.
level4.eventText5:
You feel your body start changing drastically. 
You fainted.
level4.eventText6: When you are awake again, you find yourself turning into a dragon.
level4.eventText7: Your brain starts to become foggy and unlogical.
level4.eventText8: You realize you are slowly losing your mind.
level4.eventText9: Before you lost all your consciousness...
level4.eventText10: ...you used the last bit of the power within the sword...
level4.eventText11: ...to transport yourself within the turbulence of time to avoid dangering the world.
level4.eventText12: What you did not expect is that the turbulence brought you to the past.
level4.eventText13: Without consciousness, you destroyed your hometown...
level4.eventText14: The guardian appears in the past timeline...
level4.eventText15: ...picking up the sword that got transported back.
level4.eventText16: Guardian: Looks like this timeline has failed...
level4.eventText17: Guardian: Looks like this timeline has failed...

level5.eventText1: You try to block the curse with the power of the sword...
level5.eventText2: Even though the curse is strong...
level5.eventText4: ...since you have not used the power of the sword yet.
level5.eventText5: You defended yourself from the curse...
level5.eventText6: The dragon looks at you with disbelief and fascination.
level5.eventText7: You realize that the dragon is what it is due to the curse.
level5.eventText8: You decide to use the sword to cure the dragon.
level5.eventText10: After a while, the person gets up.
level5.eventText11: Men: So... this is it. I am the one who destroyed my own hometown.
level5.eventText12:
You are shocked. 
The person looks exactly like you.
level5.eventText15: You realize that he shares similar experiences with you.
level5.eventText16: The only difference is that he used the power of the sword to revive himself within the dungeon...
level5.eventText17: ...which caused him to not be able to defend the curse from the dragon.
level5.eventText18: The curse turned him into a dragon and made him go insane.
level5.eventText19: The turbulence of time transported him back to the past...
level5.eventText21: However, after discussion, you two realize a problem.
level5.eventText22: Because you saved him in this timeline...
level5.eventText23: ...and no sword is transported back to the past.
level5.eventText24: In this case, where did your own sword come from?
level5.eventText25: In this moment, the guardian appears.
level5.eventText26: Guardian: looks like there are a lot of questions I need to answer.
level5.eventText27: He takes off his mask and reveals his face.
level5.eventText28: You two are shocked. The guardian looks exactly the same as you two.
level5.eventText29: Guardian: that's right, I am you two on a different timeline.
level5.eventText30: He looks at the men who once was a dragon.
level5.eventText31: Guardian: I am the future you.
level5.eventText32: Guardian: To protect the logic behind the time loop, afterward, you will return to the past with the sword.
level5.eventText33: Guardian: You will keep giving away the sword to yourself in different timelines...
level5.eventText34: Guardian: ...until the timeline that breaks the loop comes.
level5.eventText35: He hands the sword to the men.
level5.eventText36: Guardian: my journey has ended, but yours has just begun.
level5.eventText37: Then, the guardian looks at you.
level5.eventText38: Guardian: About you, the special one amongst all of us...
level5.eventText39: Guardian: ...the one who broke the time loop, you still have infinite possibilities.
level5.eventText40: Guardian: Go, go find your new future ahead of you.
